linkjvm.high.sensors.analog.acceleration

Class AccelerationSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • linkjvm.high.sensors.analog.acceleration.AccelerationSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnalogSensor

    public class AccelerationSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAnalogSensor
    An object of this class is used to access the KIPR Link's acceleration sensors.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Markus Klein
